Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.gui.controllers

Class GameListController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.gui.controllers.ViewController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.gui.controllers.GameListController
public class GameListController extends ViewController
Scene used to show the list of existing games after the response of the server to the user command getListGames
